items.sentence: I think that Tom is going to get fired soon.
Tom bought three tickets, and gave Mary one.
What's one thing that you really like to do?
Tom and Mary claimed that they'd seen a UFO.
Tom spent a lot of money fixing his tractor.
What impressed me the most was the blue sky.
Why aren't you at home with your family now?
You and I are like-minded people, after all.
I've been reflecting on what you said to me.
I went to the station to see my brother off.
I sat behind a very tall man in the theater.
I stopped smoking for the sake of my health.
I summoned up my courage, and walked inside.
I forgot to wind my watch up, so it stopped.
I said that I would be twenty next birthday.
I felt the house shake a little. Didn't you?
I lay down not so much to sleep as to think.
I hear there was an earthquake in Australia.
I was used to studying when I was a student.
I lost my receipt. Can I still get a refund?
